title: The “Gun Bill” Is Worse Than You Thought (Ep 1795)
description:
In this episode, I address the disastrous gun bill, proposed late yesterday, and what it means for you. I also discuss Biden’s plan for a “great reset” using gas prices. 

News Picks:


Mixed results for Trump-endorsed candidates last night.

What's In the Senate's 'Bipartisan Safer Communities Act'?


The grappling video discussed in the show.


The media is doing its best to cover up Biden’s role in the baby formula crisis.

Hack media clowns are telling voters to ignore gas prices when voting in November. 


Get woke, go broke, Disney Edition. 

Twitter board recommends shareholders accept Elon Musk offer.

The GOP should respond to Biden’s proposal to suspend the gas tax.
